measurements_data.source: UN DESA (United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs). 2014b. In "World Urbanization Prospects: The 2014 Revision." Population Division, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, United Nations. June.

Tekes (Finnish Funding Agency for Technology and Innovation). 2013. Future Watch Report: Future of Waste Management in Russian Megacities. Finnish Funding Agency for Technology and Innovation (Tekes). December.  Accessed April 25, 2017. https://www.tekes.fi/globalassets/julkaisut/future_of_waste_management_in_russian_megacities.pdf.
measurements_data.comments: Approximately 75 percent of total waste is produced by hh, while the rest comes from the commercial sector
